name: GOG - Firefox / KDE dark colors fixes
description: Fixes various issues on GOG site for users of Firefox and KDE dark color schemes like Krita-dark and Wonton Soup (such as white on white text in the search bar and etc). breeze-gtk-theme GTK theme was used.
additional_info:
v0.1 - initial release.
v0.2 - fixes for support form.
v0.3 - updated for new GOG design.
v0.31 - added dark color for dropdown text in chat UI.
